float GetMedianDev ( float  arr[],
int  n,
float  median 
)

Return the median deviation

0.674433 is magic number such that this deviation is the same as a classic standard deviation assuming a normal distribution function (gaussian)

Definition at line 161 of file calculate.cpp.

{
   int i;

   /* Calculate the median deviation at each location in the array */
   for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
      arr[i] = (float)fabs(arr[i] - median);
   }

   return GetMedian(arr, n) / 0.674433;
}
